channel.title: Altar wont work on 317 DeltaScape
channel.description:
hello, just need some help for someone that im helping develop a server, he cannot find out how to make the Altar on his server work and ive looked and i cant find nothing either.
can someone post a code for it below please.
when we click on it just does nothing at all and dont even say anything...
Thanks.
